# Dough Divider Rounders

Home / Tortilla-Flatbread Equipment / Dough Prep / **Dough Divider Rounders**

## Dough Divider Rounders

The Semi-Automatic Dough Divider Rounder minimizes skilled labor and provides
consistent dough.

Request a Quote

Request a Demo

  *   *   *   *   * 

### Specifications

IDEAL FOR Flour-Based Tortillas, Chapati, Roti, Naan, Thepla, Lavash, Yufka,
Shawarma, Piadina and more (not rated for corn or gluten-free
tortillas/flatbreads).

DIMENSIONS 29”L x 29”W x 78”H

CAPACITY 30 – 36 Part / 0.7 – 4.3 oz. Dough Ball

ELECTRICAL 220V

SHIPPING WEIGHT 880 lbs.

Certifications
